title: Nitham Nitham Lyrics Bandha Pasam
stanzas:
koadu potu vazhnthavargal
eththanaiyo
konda kuriyum thavari
ponavargal eththanaiyo

surai vidhaitha nilathil
veru chedi mulaithathu
kadhal kadhaiyil paadhi
nadakkum podhu
sirai vizhunthadhu.(2)

thangai uyir thaanirundha
idathil nindrathu.
kandu angum ingum
indri ondru mayangukindrathu.

ilamai thulli ezhunthu nindru
kadhal endrathu.
kudumba nilamai edhiril
vandhu nindru
kadamai endrathu (2)

kadhalenum poo ularndhu
kadamai vendrathu.
endrum maedum pallam
ullathuthaan vazhkai enbadhu.

thani kodiyaai nadai ilandhu
thavithadhu ondru.
adhan thunaiku vandhu
thuyar thudaikka nindradhu ondru(2)

idharkidhuthaan endru munbu
yaar ninaithathu.
pali ingu vandhu
mudiyum endraal
yaar thaduppadhu.
